name: Malaszki
description:
This game is a submission for GGJ 2019 which I've made with small team of my friends. 
More details: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/malaszki

All he ever wanted was to be alone. So he built a house. 

A house, where he lived.  Alone. 

One stormy night, the sea brought him a roommate. He was not alone anymore.

 The thing was just too damn cute. So he kept it. And that's when he realised.

 The house became a home. A home that they will protect. Together.
